vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Ningbo Xiangshan Sea View
title: China Oceanfront Resort with Direct Access to Beach
description: Discover the pristine oasis of the East China Sea coastline with a stunning mountainous backdrop when you stay at Crowne Plaza Ningbo Xiangshan Sea View, an IHG Hotel. Indulge in a luxurious vacation of unparalleled ocean views coupled with sensational cuisine and captivating water activities. Immerse yourself in the culture of China's ancient harbour town with expeditions to the historic fishing ports, mingle with the locals and experience all the city has to offer.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Ningbo Xiangshan Sea View, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Donghai Banbianshan Tourist Zone, Shipu Town, Xiangshan, Ningbo 315732, China

title: Ningbo Riverfront Family Friendly Escape with Fun-Filled Kids Club & Playground
description: Stroll along the landscaped waterfront of the Yongjiang River and find yourself outside the stunning InterContinental Ningbo, an IHG Hotel. Perfect for a romantic escape or family holiday, this hotel has something for every traveller. For the little ones, there's a fun Kids Club, Blue Whale Paradise and jungle gym castle that will keep them endlessly entertained. Meanwhile, the onsite restaurants offer perfect options for a romantic dinner for two, with western and authentic local delights.
offer_address: 777 Xin Hui Road, National Hi-tech Industrial, Ningbo, 315048, China

title: Sophisticated Ningbo China City Break Near Central Tianyi Square
description: Positioned in the vibrant heart of Ningbo - just minutes from the iconic fountains and waterways of Tianyi Square - Crowne Plaza City Center Ningbo, an IHG Hotel, offers guests the perfect chance to explore the ancient harbour city’s many charms. After days spent walking the Yong River or visiting the millennia-old Qita Temple, return to the quirky Café Galleria for plates showcasing international cuisine or head to Kaiganglou for fine dining drawing on the region’s rich culinary history.
location_description: Crowne Plaza City Center Ningbo, an IHG Hotel
